name: @cuboid3/core
description: Core Library part of Cuboid3, 3D Game Engine for Node and the browser

scripts.locs: find ./g-physics -name '*.ts' | xargs wc -l  && find ./src -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.handlebars' | xargs wc -l && find ./client-src -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.tsx' | xargs wc -l  && find ./game -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.tsx' | xargs wc -l && find ./scenarios -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.tsx' | xargs wc -l
scripts.locs-total: echo g-physics && find ./g-physics -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.tsx' | xargs wc -l | grep 'total' && echo server && find ./src -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.handlebars' | xargs wc -l | grep 'total' && echo client && find ./client-src -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.tsx' -o -name '*.scss' -o -name '*.css' | xargs wc -l | grep 'total' && echo game && find ./game -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.tsx' | xargs wc -l | grep 'total' && echo scenarios && find ./scenarios -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.tsx' | xargs wc -l | grep 'total' && echo all && find ./src ./client-src ./scenarios ./game ./g-physics -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.handlebars' -o -name '*.tsx' -o -name '*.scss' -o -name '*.css' | xargs wc -l | grep 'total'

author: debian4tw
